page.title: 09WOLSTON CHILD'S SCHOOLDAY 1.
page.content: We start the day on Monday by paying our dinner money for the week (Â£3.05) and our{swimming}money, 60pence to go on a coach to Coventry Baths. Each day in school includes some writing, maths, topic work, art and craft, music and science activities, singing and stories. This week we have seen a schools' television programme about{ {Patterns in Maths}and we found how many different ways we could solve problems. Every day we have a{playtime in the morning for 15 minutes and then after working some more, we have our lunch from 12 noon to 1.15 p.m. Some children have a school meal which is cooked at Knightlow First School and then transported by van to Wolston. Our{favourite meal}is beefburgers, chips and baked beans. Just over half the children bring sandwiches, crisps, biscuits and perhaps fruit from home.
